Update?! NOOO!

*takes a step back, tripping over a chair, falling off a 200 story building, 
and dying*

Ha, now you have to do the update!

Just kidding. If case anyone's wondering why I havn't been updating, it 
because of school (it all goes back to that, doesn't it?). I have very little 
time at home where I used to have the site on my comp  (I'd edit it and 
upload it to tripod), so it was either that or RPGing. And, being a selfish 
SOB, I chose RPGing :-)

Anyways, I've been planning to scrapp the site and make a new one for a long 
time now, and recently, I've been kinda forced into starting it. My web site 
comp crashed (as in no data on hard drive), while I was remaking it into a 
web server, so I'm working on a new site now. Its looks better (thanx to 
Logo's suggestions), and will be up as soon as I get the CGI script for the 
join form and my web server working, and as soon as I finally get Sprint 
Broadband and have a stable enough connection to support a web server.

::Zardus/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/Havoc/Repressor/DevilDuer::

Zardus fires a few shots at Stronghold, turning his head as his wrist 
computer beeps, reporting someone trying to access classified information. 
Easilly dodging Jetsotrorm's shots and tapping a few buttons, he orders the 
Alliance base's computer to disallow any access to any classified info, and 
to keep a close log.

Turning back to the battle, he fires again at Stronghold, gliding in to land 
on the ground.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike fires at one of the missiles heading for him, making it explode. 
The explosion covers him with flame, the Alliance bot gritting his teeth in 
pain.

He looks arond as the flames clear, seeing Sharpedge carry Jetstorm to a CR. 
He flies forward, flying up to the Mafia base and looking through a hole, 
Reptilica flying up near him.

"Shall we blow the CR chambers?" Bloodystrike asks, the other nodding and 
suddenly flying back as an autogun shot hits him. He flies forward again, the 
two dodging autogun fire as they attempt to enter the base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Diving again for another attack, Havoc drops two bombs at Stronghold and 
Blender, firing at Rizopas with his machine guns.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer raises an eyebrow plate as Diamond wakes up, asks her questions, 
and faints again. He changes course to the lab, figuring that he might as 
well launch a reprogramming programm while she was unconscious.

"Well," the rather small bot says to the unconscious femm, "I'm DevilDuer, an 
Alliance bot. One of the best, ya know. I rescued ya from your ship, which 
crashed almost right on this base! This is the Alliance base, and the 
Alliance is led by Zardus. I'm real high in th' ranks, though, so stickin' by 
me could do ya good."
